data.title: fermi-gce-flows: Infer the Galactic Center gamma-ray excess
data.name: fermi-gce-flows
data.description: Simulation-based inference for the Galactic Center gamma-ray excess. Code repository associated with https://arxiv.org/abs/2110.06931.

evidence: "Simulation-based inference for the Galactic Center Excess" with code files like simulate.py, train.py, nptfit.py indicating a full analysis pipeline rather than a reusable library API.
"train.py trains the model. Experiments are managed using `MLflow'." and the notebook reproduces the baseline analysis on Fermi data, showing it directly produces research results.

"The notebook ... shows a minimal example of loading the pre-trained model included in this repository, drawing samples from it, and reproducing the baseline analysis on Fermi data" indicates users clone and run from the repository, with no mention of package managers or binaries.
